sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANGARA, a town of Hindustan, in the province of Nandere, belonging to the nizam. It is situated at the junction of the Manzora with the river Godavery, forty- three miles from the town of Nandere. Long. 78. 12. E. Lat. 18.49. N.
